#summary Example Component File

= example.cmp =
<font size="3" face="Georgia, Arial">
#The Component Name, Should be unique<br/>
@CMP_NAME=TEST_BEAN

#The Component Description<br/>
@CMP_DESC=Test Bean

#Is The Component available Through Ajax<br/>
@AJAX_AVAIL=true

#Is the Component exposed as a Web-Service<br/>
@WEBS_AVAIL=true

#Can the Component be additionally invoked using MI<br/>
@MINV_AVAIL=true

#Is AUTO Trnsaction enabled?<br/>
@AUTO_TRANS=true

#The Threading Strategy<br/>
@THRD_PER_REQ=false

#The Thread Pool size<br/>
@THRD_POOL_NUM=20

#The Authorization source<br/>
@AUTH_FROM=database

#The Details of the Auth Source<br/>
@AUTH_DETS=@DB

#Is Authorization required for All Services?<br/>
@AUTH_ALL=false

#The User Groups that can access the Services<br/>
@USR_GRP_ALWD=UG_1,UG_2,UG_3

#The Users that are Blocked.<br/>
@BLOCK_USERS=user1,user2

#The Protocols allowed<br/>
@PROTO_ALWD=tcp,http,udp

#The DB connection Pool Size<br/>
@DB_CONN_POOL_NUM=10

#The Auth Connection Source<br/>
@AUTH_CONN_SRC=test_dsn

#The Auth Source User Name<br/>
@AUTH_USR_NAME=test

#The Auth Source User Password<br/>
@AUTH_USR_PASS=test

#The Auth Source Address<br/>
@AUTH_ADD=

#Are Sessions allowed<br/>
@SESSION=false

#The Service Details<br/>
#@NAME is the Service Name<br/>
#@USR_GRP_ALWD are the User Groups allowed to access the Component<br/>
#@SIGNATURE is the Service signature<br/>
#@ARGS are the arguments required for the Service<br/>
#SRV_RET is the Service Return type<br/>
@SERVICE1=@NAME(myFirstService) @USR_GRP_ALWD(UG_1,UG_2) @SIGNATURE(Service1.service1) @ARGS(void) @SRV_RET(string)<br/>
@SERVICE2=@NAME(mySecondService) @BLOCK_USERS(user7) @SIGNATURE(Service2.service2) @ARGS(string) @SRV_RET(string)
</font>
